column4: hey all. i was wondering if there was any way to change the height of the buttons in gnome. http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=698288
i was wondering if there was any way to change the height of the buttons in gnome. http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=698288
just buy a smaller or bigger monitor
i wanted to change the PADDING on the buttons
i want to change the padding
i understand... but it's going to get things smaller... even the padding
EVERYTHING is going to be smaller
not talking about your penis right now
so the buttons themselves cant be smaller without effecting other things?
buy a new monitor and increase the button size
thanks. The screenshot is in the thread http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=698288
